alert.note: Alert for Bell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 7:01PM EST until February 26 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Pineville affecting Bell County. South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Pineville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 996.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is falling, but will continue to run high through late this evening. - Action stage is 995.0 feet. - Flood stage is 1002.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
